name: Generate Synthetic Images from Prompts
description: Generate synthetic images using a text-to-image model from a set of user-provided prompts.

generation_model.title: Generation Model. Only local models can be used

generation_model.ui:help: Select the model to be used for generating QA pairs

image_width.ui:help: Width of each generated image in pixels.

image_height.ui:help: Height of each generated image in pixels.

images_per_prompt.ui:help: Number of images to generate for each prompt (1 to 8).
